meanings.definition: The state or quality of being dense.
meanings.sent1: The denseness of the forest made it hard to see through.
meanings.sent2: The denseness of the crowd at the concert made it difficult to move around.
meanings.sent3: The denseness of the cake batter made it impossible to spread evenly in the pan.
meanings.sent4: The denseness of the fog enveloped the entire town in a mysterious haze.
meanings.sent5: The denseness of the book's plot kept me engaged until the very end.

meanings.definition: The degree to which something is dense.
meanings.sent1: The denseness of the fabric made it perfect for keeping out the cold.
meanings.sent2: The denseness of the traffic on the highway caused long delays.
meanings.sent3: The denseness of the sauce made it rich and flavorful.
meanings.sent4: The denseness of the forest canopy blocked out most of the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The denseness of the material made it ideal for soundproofing the room.
